parameters: There! The noise came from there! Turns out there is a basement!
(Oh no! They heard it! What should I do???)
(I could hide in a sack, but there is something in them,
and I don’t have time to shake it out!)
(I could hide in a sack, but there is something in them,
and I don’t have time to shake it out!)
You hear that? The clock is ticking!
(No-no-no-no!!! Now I can't move, they might notice!!!)
What are you talking about?! This is the best part!
Here, look! The clock is going backwards and the inscription here
See? This clock was made by a Clockmaker when his son died.
They say that the Clockmaker practiced some black magic and with the
help of this clock he wanted to turn back time and bring his son back
However, something went wrong and the magic worked against him. He
was found dead hugging this clock.
After his death, all the clocks he made stopped. And his spirit has
taken up residence in this house.
Maybe he dropped this clock to show us he was here.
H-he? You mean, the g-g-ghost?! Please, let's get out of here...
(They're busy with the clock, maybe they won't even come up here?)
What do we have there? Oh! Statues!
Let's have a look! I've heard something about them, too...
(I'm a statue, I won't give myself away!..)
HEY! I'm with you! Don't leave me!..
Oh! Look what a realistic statue!
Makes you want to touch her!
Why not? Look at this statue!
What if... What if the ghost will jump out, if we disturb anything
Don't be such a coward! Look, I'm going to touch her, and nothing
(Damn it! I can't hide behind the statues, they're right
up against the wall! Unless I pretend to be a statue!)
(I want to cover up, I'm naked!)
(Or should I get into a pose?)
(But I'm not covered like that! I don't want people to stare at my
